data.message: I'm just curious. I just got a notification that Facebook is now going to start showing my notifications by how you think I'll find them most important. How exactly do you know who or what i find most important? I already miss posts from my friends because my timeline is constantly defaulting back to Top Stories instead of being in chronological order like i want it. I don't understand why anyone would think this is a good idea. There are many options in place to keep things off our notifications and timeline if we don't want them there. How can Facebook tell me what I want to see??? Its a terrible idea and very irritating !!!

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Heather. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2zc0YlR. -Anna
Facebook My account was literally disabled by mistake when someone used my account while Im away. My friend did and used it and it may have violate your Facebook terms. Please help me.
